subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan hit a fadeaway jumper late in overtime to give San Antonio a needed cushion on the way to winning the Western Conference finals and setting up a rematch with the Miami Heat in the finals.
snippet: Tim Duncan hit a fadeaway jumper late in overtime to give San Antonio a needed cushion on the way to winning the Western Conference finals and setting up a rematch with the Miami Heat in the finals.
